title: Hackers earn over $1 million for 58 zero-days at Pwn2Own Toronto
description: The Pwn2Own Toronto 2023 hacking competition has ended with security researchers earning $1,038,500 for 58 zero-day exploits (and multiple bug collisions) targeting consumer products between October 24 and October 27. [...]

title: The Week in Ransomware - October 27th 2023 - Breaking Records
description: Ransomware attacks are increasing significantly, with reports indicating that last month was a record month for ransomware attacks in 2023. [...]

title: Microsoft 365 users get workaround for ‘Something Went Wrong’ errors
description: Microsoft shared a workaround for a known Microsoft 365 issue triggering 'Something Went Wrong [1001]' sign-in errors and making desktop applications unusable for many customers. [...]

title: Lazarus hackers breached dev repeatedly to deploy SIGNBT malware
description: The North Korean Lazarus hacking group repeatedly compromised a software vendor using flaws in vulnerable software despite multiple patches and warnings being made available by the developer. [...]

title: F5 fixes BIG-IP auth bypass allowing remote code execution attacks
description: A critical vulnerability in the F5 BIG-IP configuration utility, tracked as CVE-2023-46747, allows an attacker with remote access to the configuration utility to perform unauthenticated remote code execution. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5031455 preview update enables Moment 4 features by default
description: Microsoft has released the optional KB5031455 Preview cumulative update for Windows 11 22H2, which enables 72 new Moment 4 features by default and fixes 22 issues. [...]
